subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees lost Michael Pineda to injury and added no pitchers in trades. But on Wednesday, they will unveil Severino, who will be the youngest pitcher to make a start in the majors this season.
snippet: The Yankees lost Michael Pineda to injury and added no pitchers in trades. But on Wednesday, they will unveil Severino, who will be the youngest pitcher to make a start in the majors this season.
